manifest.name: react-addons-shallow-compare

scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:prod && node ../postbuild.js

manifest.readme: # react-addons-shallow-compare >**Note:** >This is a legacy React addon, and is no longer maintained. > >We don't encourage using it in new code, but it exists for backwards compatibility. >The recommended migration path is to use [`React.PureComponent`](https://facebook.github.io/react/docs/react-api.html#react.purecomponent) instead. **Importing** ```javascript import shallowCompare from 'react-addons-shallow-compare'; // ES6 var shallowCompare = require('react-addons-shallow-compare'); // ES5 with npm ``` If you prefer a ` ``` In this case, make sure to put the `
